review.title: “good experience but underpaid”
review.pros: Pros – fairly casual, lots of interation with all employees, ability to work on complex projects and cases, lots of client interaction
review.cons: Cons – low pay, no insurance, no sick leave, high stress for no reason, lots of client interaction, no concept of how long projects actually take to complete
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – please realize that employees work hard and deserve to be compensated, or at a minimum, thanked for their hard work
